code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Navbar from"../../components/Navbar";import Footer from"../../components/Footer";import ServiceForm from"./ServiceForm";import{Link,useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditService=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[service,setService]=useState({});const[price,setPrice]=useState("");const[date,setDate]=useState(null);const authKey=localStorage.getItem("jwt");const navigate=useNavigate();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const apiUrl=window.location.origin.includes("localhost")?"http://localhost:5000/services/".concat(id):"https://khamco-shop-backend.onrender.com/services/".concat(id);useEffect(()=>{document.title="Edit Service Details - Khamco Shop";const fetchService=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(apiUrl,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(authKey)}});setService(response.data.service.service);setPrice(response.data.service.price);setDate(response.data.service.date);}catch(error){setService({});toast.error(error.message);}};fetchService();},[apiUrl,authKey]);const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setLoading(true);if(!service||!price||!date){toast.warn("Please enter all fields.");setLoading(false);return;}await axios.put(apiUrl,{service:service,price:price,date:date},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(authKey)}}).then(response=>{toast.success(response.data.message);navigate("/services");setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{toast.error(error.message);setLoading(false);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"p-[4rem]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"p-[4rem] grid justify-center items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/services",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-arrow-left"})," Services"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Edit Service"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:"flex flex-col justify-center items-center w-[90vw]",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceForm,{setService:setService,setPrice:setPrice,setDate:setDate,service:service,price:price,date:date,loading:loading})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default EditService;
